body.p: The long awaited Gentoo Not-For-Profit is now official. Here's the announcement Daniel Robbins sent to gentoo-nfp@gentoo.org:
body.pre:
From: Daniel Robbins Sent: Monday, June 07, 2004 10:08 AM To: gentoo-nfp@lists.gentoo.org Subject: [gentoo-nfp] Nfp paperwork approved
Hi guys,
Just passing along an email that the NFP paperwork was approved. I am going to pick up several copies of the paperwork today.
This means that the NFP now officially exists.
Regards, Daniel
